mapper.sql: id as id , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , status as status , resId as resId , displayName as displayName , colId as colId , orderNum as orderNum , width as width , edittype as edittype , editable as editable , editoptions as editoptions , editrules as editrules , formatter as formatter , formatoptions as formatoptions , unformat as unformat , hide as hide , unedit as unedit , description as description , moduleName as moduleName
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sss_resource_grid ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resId, displayName, colId, orderNum, width, edittype, editable, editoptions, editrules, formatter, formatoptions, unformat, hide, unedit, description, moduleName ) VALUES ( #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{resId}, #{displayName}, #{colId}, #{orderNum}, #{width}, #{edittype}, #{editable}, #{editoptions}, #{editrules}, #{formatter}, #{formatoptions}, #{unformat}, #{hide}, #{unedit}, #{description}, #{moduleName} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE sss_resource_grid
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
resId = #{resId},
displayName = #{displayName},
colId = #{colId},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
width = #{width},
edittype = #{edittype},
editable = #{editable},
editoptions = #{editoptions},
editrules = #{editrules},
formatter = #{formatter},
formatoptions = #{formatoptions},
unformat = #{unformat},
hide = #{hide},
unedit = #{unedit},
description = #{description},
moduleName = #{moduleName},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE sss_resource_grid
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
resId = #{map.resId},
displayName = #{map.displayName},
colId = #{map.colId},
orderNum = #{map.orderNum},
width = #{map.width},
edittype = #{map.edittype},
editable = #{map.editable},
editoptions = #{map.editoptions},
editrules = #{map.editrules},
formatter = #{map.formatter},
formatoptions = #{map.formatoptions},
unformat = #{map.unformat},
hide = #{map.hide},
unedit = #{map.unedit},
description = #{map.description},
moduleName = #{map.moduleName},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sss_resource_grid ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resId, displayName, colId, orderNum, width, edittype, editable, editoptions, editrules, formatter, formatoptions, unformat, hide, unedit, description, moduleName ) VALUES ( #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.resId}, #{map.displayName}, #{map.colId}, #{map.orderNum}, #{map.width}, #{map.edittype}, #{map.editable}, #{map.editoptions}, #{map.editrules}, #{map.formatter}, #{map.formatoptions}, #{map.unformat}, #{map.hide}, #{map.unedit}, #{map.description}, #{map.moduleName} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, creator
, createDate
, lastModifier
, lastModDate
, status
, resId
, displayName
, colId
, orderNum
, width
, edittype
, editable
, editoptions
, editrules
, formatter
, formatoptions
, unformat
, hide
, unedit
, description
, moduleName
FROM sss_resource_grid
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND resId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.resId} , '%')
AND displayName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.displayName} , '%')
AND colId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.colId} , '%')
AND orderNum like CONCAT('%', #{condition.orderNum} , '%')
AND width like CONCAT('%', #{condition.width} , '%')
AND edittype like CONCAT('%', #{condition.edittype} , '%')
AND editable like CONCAT('%', #{condition.editable} , '%')
AND editoptions like CONCAT('%', #{condition.editoptions} , '%')
AND editrules like CONCAT('%', #{condition.editrules} , '%')
AND formatter like CONCAT('%', #{condition.formatter} , '%')
AND formatoptions like CONCAT('%', #{condition.formatoptions} , '%')
AND unformat like CONCAT('%', #{condition.unformat} , '%')
AND hide like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hide} , '%')
AND unedit like CONCAT('%', #{condition.unedit} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{condition.description} , '%')
AND moduleName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.moduleName} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
